titles.title: Keep Our PACT Act
A bill to require full funding of part A of title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 and the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act.
Keep Our PACT Act
Keep Our Promise to America's Children and Teachers Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Keep Our Promise to America's Children and Teachers Act or the Keep Our PACT Act
This bill mandates funding at specified levels for FY2020-FY2029 to support (1) public elementary and secondary schools with high percentages of children from low-income families, and (2) special education and related services for children with disabilities.
